Package com.stoyanr.mastermind

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Algorithm
    Interface to be implemented by strategy implementations.
    AlgorithmFactory
    Interface to be implemented by algorithm factory implementations.
    CodeVisitor
    Interface for visitors accepted by the Mastermind.visitCodes(CodeVisitor) method.
    Player
    Interface to be implemented by players.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAlgorithm
    An abstract Algorithm implementation to be extended by the concrete strategies.
    AbstractIOPlayer
    An abstract Player implementation for "human" players that use I/O streams, such as the console, for interacting with a Game.
    AlgorithmEvaluator
    An evaluator of the effectiveness of the different strategies.
    DefaultPlayer
    A Player implementation for "computer" players that interact with a Game directly.
    Distribution
    A distribution, or data set, of integer values.
    DumbAlgorithm
    A "dumb" strategy, mainly intended to be used for testing.
    DumbAlgorithmFactory
    A factory for DumbAlgorithm instances.
    ExpectedSizeAlgorithm
    An implementation of the "expected size" Mastermind strategy.
    ExpectedSizeAlgorithmFactory
    A factory for ExpectedSizeAlgorithm instances.
    Game
    A single Mastermind game.
    GuessCalculator
    A performance optimization facility which calculates and stores the guesses made by a particular algorithm for a given game setup, for up to a predefined number of game rounds (or "levels").
    KnuthAlgorithm
    An implementation of the "worst-case" Mastermind strategy, first published by Donald Knuth.
    KnuthAlgorithmFactory
    A factory for KnuthAlgorithm instances.
    Main
    A simple command line program to test and demonstrate the capabilities of this package.
    Mastermind
    A particular Mastermind game setup.
    Messages
    A utility class to retrieve messages from a resource file.
    PharaoxAlgorithm
    An implementation of the "PharaoX" strategy.
    PharaoxAlgorithmFactory
    A factory for PharaoxAlgorithm instances.
    ReaderWriterPlayer
    A concrete Player implementation for "human" players that use I/O streams, such as the console, for interacting with a Game.
    Score
    A Mastermind score, or "answer".
    SimpleAlgorithm
    An implementation of the "simple" Mastermind strategy.
    SimpleAlgorithmFactory
    A factory for SimpleAlgorithm instances.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MastermindException
    An exception thrown by any method in this package when a non-generic error is encountered.
